REST.content: Heidegger’s schema (in barely displaced Kantian sense): hybrid, mediation, double-belonging, double articulation > product (Zeug) situated btwn thing & work of art (Werk always that of art in this context), intermediary place (Zwischenstellung), inter-posture (Lacoue-Labarthe), inter-stela
